name: MacaoOS Anina Build 1022 Simulator
description:
This is a joke operating system made in Scratch, it was made on December 29, 2022, then compiled to an HTML file on January 1, 2023, it was made to public on January 1, 2023

This is not an OS, it's a simulator. Don't be confused with its name, it's not even related to MacOS. This is a parody of Windows.

All icons (Excluding the MacaoOS logo) used in this simulator are not mine. They belong to their original owners.

Feel free to make a gameplay/review/video about this simulator!

Sorry but i am not making the source code available.
